title: New typefaces nedded for your critiques
content:
Hello friends.

I was advised to submit my new designed typefaces in this great web site. I have collected them in one PDF file and made it as an attachment below.

Please, try to help me by commenting and mentioning and kind of necessary modifications for my designed typefaces.

Thank you for your great cooperation.

[OHamburgefonstiv](http://web.archive.org/web/20150416054320/http:/typophile.com/files/OHamburgefonstiv_English.pdf)
author: Eyadnalsamman

comments.content: I would advise you to do a single PDF for each typeface, and post it on the appropriate section.
